properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c2 v2 c2 v3 c2 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andarilo unnatudu ayanan neevu cherchukonu (2) Rakshana neevu pondu nede (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee jeevamu epaatidi ? Oka naadidi Viduvavalen vyardam vyardam ee loka maya{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee koraketenchenila mukthiniche Yesu prabhu Oppukonu tappidamulan{/lang-eng}
